thread.title: Spring Airlines to raise funds for fleet expansion
thread.title_full: Spring Airlines to raise funds for fleet expansion | Finance & Data content from ATWOnline

author: Katie Cantle
title: Spring Airlines to raise funds for fleet expansion
text:
Spring Airlines plans to raise CNY4.5 billion ($735 million) to expand its Airbus A320 fleet. The Shanghai-based carrier will circulate no more than 38.396 million A shares at CNY117.2 per share.
According a statement released by the Shanghai Stock Exchange, Spring Airlines is expected to purchase 21 Airbus A320 aircraft. It currently operates a single fleet of 51 A320s on more than 70 domestic and international routes. It has established five domestic bases in Shanghai, Hangzhou, Kunming, Shijiazhuang and Shenyang. This year it plans to introduce 10 new A320s and expand its fleet to 100 aircraft by 2018.
Spring also noted its first-half net profit is expected to jump 130% to 150% from a net income of CNY270 million in the year-ago period. The carrier credited lower fuel prices and robust market demand growth as the main reasons for the much-improved performance.
